ModMetaData.name: Rolling Table VG Addon
ModMetaData.author: Dr Zhivago
ModMetaData.description:
An addon for Vegetable Garden Project "Garden Medicine". Use with the "Rolling Table" mod. Do not use alone.
Load this mod below VGP Garden Medicine and Rolling Table mods.
Credits: Xen- for helping me realize I was missing defs ilawz- for texture modifications
